website_summaries.verdict: A very good wine glass that is perfectly safe to toss in the dishwasher – a bit of a rarity with good crystal.
pros: Extremely high quality, blown crystal that is dishwasher safe
Large bowl and thin rim really do help enhance the wine-drinking experience
cons: A bit expensive, but well worth it if you want a glass that will impress your guests

customer_reviews.title: I love the glasses(set of 8) but one has a tippy ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the glasses(set of 8) but one has a tippy bottom, not flat. It will be too much trouble (finding the boxes, repacking, going to the post office) to return the whole set for replacement. I don't see any other options with Amazon as the seller. I am stuck with an expensive defective glass. I expect better quality control from the manufacturer and better options for correcting the fault from Amazon. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: anderson

customer_reviews.title: Quality glasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband as upgraded everyday glasses. He keeps mentioning the ring one hears when you ping the glass telling him they are of much higher quality than the old everyday glasses.. They are elegantly simple and sized to be okay for both red and white wines, unless you insist on the 20 oz. bowls for reds.They arrived well packed and intact. Given the price for these most places, this 8 for 6 deal is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Combination different
customer_reviews.text: 7416/05 is the number I received except the glasses are labeled Viognier/Chardonnay. I guess Riedel uses the same glass for different combinations of whites.
customer_reviews.author: fussy consumer

customer_reviews.title: Riedel is My Go To
customer_reviews.text: Great set of white glasses. Bought these to serve some excellent Chenin Blanc for Thanksgiving. I was NOT disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonlorde

customer_reviews.title: Glasses set a good tone for dinner party
customer_reviews.text: I was hand washing these glasses and turning them upside down to drain on an absorbent pad. I knocked two of them over onto our quartz countertop and to my great surprise neither one broke! I was also pleased when we were toasting at the table to "good friends, food and wine," when my boss commented that the clink of the glasses sounded good too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: One glass was delivered broken
customer_reviews.text: Quality was good and met my expectations for Riedel however 1 out of the set of 8 glasses arrived broken but I can’t be bothered returning all 8 glasses and wait for the delivery of a new replacement set. They should allow you to return and have replaced a single or a number of glasses if they arrive damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn E

customer_reviews.title: Great wineglasses
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've phased out all of my wine glasses, EXCEPT for my Riedels. Each type is perfect for that particular style of wine, and it's a pleasure to drink fine wine out of a fine glass. The glasses are fragile, though -- I've broken many glasses just washing them -- and I recommend using a drying rack specifically for wine glasses. The set of white wine glasses I recently purchased came with two "bonus" glasses (buy 6 and get 8) - a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: real lead crystal- beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is the real thing. Non-lead glass is really nice, and getting better. Real lead crystal is still the standard, and worth the cost, IMHO. The carton is great as well; they even survive shipping. I've had the red Vinum for some years, now I'm glad I bought these. Wait for the clouds to clear from your brain after use before washing; they are fragile.
customer_reviews.author: J. Melanson

customer_reviews.title: makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy good wine then you must try Riedel glasses for the appropriate type wine you are drinking. They do make a difference. This is a special deal since you get 8 glasses for the price of 6! Not everyone is lucky enough not to break a glass at some time.
customer_reviews.author: Careful

customer_reviews.title: Very secure packing!
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses (I have had Riedel before), love that they all arrived intact in wonderfully safe packing boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Fool

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Deal

customer_reviews.title: Like the presentation and quality
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Riedel stemless glasses in the past in sets of 2 and liked the quality. I needed a set of 8 stemmed glasses for a formal dinner and these fit the bill. Although they were a bit pricier than some others I considered, the glasses are delicate and look beautiful on the table. They do tend to be fragile, but so far I have not managed to break any!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I think my wine taste better!  Okay, maybe I just like drinking from these glasses.
customer_reviews.text: We love these wine glasses! They are a bit fragile, but they are also elegant!
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: A very nice little glass...
customer_reviews.text: I find that I use this glass frequently. I have many others, including the XL versions, etc. I find that the latter are too easy to break. So, I often use this for casual and even not-so-casual quaffing.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Goldfeder

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glasses as an engagement gift. They are lightweight yet good quality. A wonderful gift for any occasion! Received in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Dani R

customer_reviews.title: Love these - great all around size and shape
customer_reviews.text: Love these - great all around size and shape. Not too small for red when you don't want to pull out the big glasses.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Riedel is a Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Riedel lives up to its great reputation! We love these glasses. They feel good on the mouth and make the wine taste better.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully mastered glasswear
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely glasses! I didn't think it could happen to me but I was also one of the unfortunates whom received a broken glass. Amazon's ever helpful representatives were swift to offer a partial refund or replace the set. I opted for a partial refund. These are lovely glasses -- seamless, thin stems complement the crystal clarity of each globe. We will certainly purchase more Vinum. They're marvelous.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Drinking Experience
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal on for some nice Riedel white wine glasses. Nice addition to our Cab Sav Riedel Glasses. Expensive to replace and require extra care when cleaning. Don't let your guests who want to help out with the dishes clean these or you are likely to have a broken one.

customer_reviews.title: Broken on delivery
customer_reviews.text: I bought 16 glasses, one arrived broken due to an error in the way a pair had been packaged by the manufacturer (they arrive in pairs). The hassle of returning 1 broken glass is too great so my purchase was not such a bargain in the end. Nothing wrong with the glasses per se.

product_meta.title: Riedel VINUM Chablis/Chardonnay Glasses, Pay for 6 get 8 -
product_meta.description: Size:Set of 8The Chardonnay glass is perfect for allowing white wines to express their freshness, spiciness, and mineral characters. This glass is designed so the Chardonnay variety's low acidity is delivered in a way that sets off the alcohol and rich flavors of the wine. The shape highlights its velvety, supple texture, emphasizing the fruit and ensuring a long, balanced finish. This pack offers eight Vinum Chardonnay/Viognier glasses from RIEDEL's Vinum series for the price of six.
